hotels.title: Beachfront Goa Oasis near Panjim with Five Restaurants, Two Pools & Luxe Spa
hotels.description: Embrace the sun-kissed magic of Goa with a stay at this lavish Grand Hyatt sanctuary overlooking the shimmering waters of the Arabian Sea, set mere moments from Panjim. Sprawling across 28 acres of landscaped gardens, spend your days here lounging by the expansive outdoor pool, sip on cocktails at Capiz Bar, and soak up the stunning west coast ocean sunsets over Bambolim Bay. Gourmands can take delight across the resort's various dining venues: from authentic Italian fare at The Verandah to Asian and Indian cuisine at The Dining Room. For some much-needed pampering, head to Shamana Spa for holistic treatments in a serene setting.
